title: Technology Consultant
description:
TechVibe Consulting is Hiring a Technology Consultant (Full-Time)

TechVibe Consulting, a Madrid-based firm, drives digital transformation for clients in tech and finance. We’re seeking an Technology Consultant to guide clients through tech solutions.

Role Summary
You’ll advise on technology strategies to enhance client performance.

Key Duties
- Develop tech strategies.
- Assess tech stacks.
- Implement digital solutions.
- Analyze business impacts.
- Present solutions to executives.
- Develop roadmaps.
- Stay updated on tech trends.
- Support client meetings.
- Manage project timelines.
- Share team insights.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 3–5 years of experience in technology consulting, with cloud platform and digital project knowledge. Strong analytical and client-facing skills are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in IT or a related field is required.

Why TechVibe?
We value innovation and collaboration. Our hybrid work model and training support growth in a dynamic environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Pension
25 days of annual leave
Training budget
Tech tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join TechVibe Consulting to drive tech solutions. Submit your application today!
